title: WTB/WTTF: t206 Cobb red - No longer need one...thanks!
author: jimivintage

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF: t206 Cobb red - No longer need one...thanks!
posts.post_content:
I am in need of a PSA or SGC graded T206 Cobb red.  I can likely only afford a PSA 1 - 3.  I'm also interested in trading for it, too, if you'd rather go that route.

I have a nice 1915 Cracker Jack Marquard SGC 60 and 1916 Famous & Barr Wheat PSA 2 I can use in the trade, too.

Jimi
Let me look around I know I have a red Cobb that is graded but I don,t remember what company gradedit. I will look around and get back to you. If you don't hear from me by Monday send me an email.

Jimi, I have three Cobbs I would trade anyone of them for the Cracker Jack Marquard. Here is a link to scans so you can look at them.
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/Texxxx/t206-duplicates/60[/url]
The second one looks the best to me except for the small paper loss on back at bottom.
If your interested, send me some scans of the Marquard. [url]Texxxx58@yahoo.com[/url]
